header.description: (Required) Message identifier is used for traceability. This identifier allows you to identify the logs of the calls to the APIs in the log repositories, it is recommended to send a UUID for this value. Example: c4e6bd04-5149-11e7-b114-12654765af2f.

(Required) Message identifier is used for traceability. This identifier allows you to identify the logs of the calls to the APIs in the log repositories, it is recommended to send a UUID for this value. Example: c4e6bd04-5149-11e7-b114-12654765af2f.
